# Lectura de los datos


```{r}

df <- read.csv("base_trabajo_segmentacion.csv", sep = ";", dec = '.', header = T)

head(df)

```

```{r}
str(df)
```
```{r}
summary(df)
```

```{r}
plot(df[2:11])
```
```{r}
for (i in 2:47){
  hist(df[, i], main = paste("Hist de ", names(df)[i]))
}

```
